mesutOzdag.title: Assistant Professor & AI Researcher
mesutOzdag.name: Mesut Ozdag, Ph.D.
mesutOzdag.desc: Assistant Professor of CS, FinTech & Digital Forensics | AI Developer

about.1: Dr. Mesut Ozdag is an Assistant Professor of Computer Science, FinTech, and Digital Forensics at the University of Central Florida. He is also the IE Assessment Coordinator for CS MS, CS Ph.D. & FinTech MS programs. His research focuses on AI development, deep learning, medical image analysis, and adversarial attacks on neural networks.
about.2: With extensive experience in both academia and industry, Dr. Ozdag has worked at prestigious organizations including Siemens Healthineers, Roche Molecular Systems, and Flywheel Inc. He serves as a scientific reviewer for top journals in medical image analysis and has published numerous papers on adversarial machine learning and medical imaging.

hero.subTitle: About
hero.title: A New Approach to Coding Education
hero.description: Our online education platform aims to transform students' careers with practice-focused Python, Machine Learning, and Discrete Math lessons.

description.1: To make coding and data science education accessible, understandable, and applicable for everyone. We ensure our students learn not just to write code, but to solve problems and think algorithmically.
description.2: Every lesson is based on real-world projects. Our students reinforce what they learn by applying it immediately and strengthening their portfolios.

teamSection.subTitle: Meet Us
teamSection.title: Our Team
teamSection.description: Our experienced and passionate team is working to provide the best learning experience.

roleDesc.founder: Founder and visionary of the platform. Expert in machine learning and AI, working to make educational technologies accessible to everyone.
roleDesc.frontendDeveloper: Develops responsive and accessible web applications. Designs interactive user interfaces with modern JavaScript frameworks.
roleDesc.uiDesigner: Creates intuitive designs prioritizing user experience. Tests product quality to ensure a seamless experience.
roleDesc.marketingSpecialist: Organizes educational content professionally and develops creative marketing strategies to increase platform visibility.
roleDesc.videoEditor: Edits educational videos to professional quality, enriching the learning experience.

sections.heading: 1. PARTIES
sections.body:
SELLER:
Title: [Platform Name] Educational Technologies Inc.
Address: Teknopark Istanbul, Sanayi Mah. Teknoloji Bulvarƒ±, Istanbul
Phone: 0850 123 45 67
Email: support@platform.com

BUYER:
The user who registers on the platform and purchases the service.

sections.heading: 2. SUBJECT
sections.body: The subject of this agreement is to determine the rights and obligations of the parties in accordance with the provisions of the Law No. 6502 on the Protection of Consumers and the Regulation on Distance Contracts regarding the sale and delivery of the product, the qualities and sales price of which are specified below, ordered electronically by the BUYER via the SELLER's website.

sections.heading: 3. PRODUCT AND SERVICES SUBJECT TO THE AGREEMENT
sections.body: The subject of this agreement consists of online educational videos, digital course materials, live class sessions, and certification programs. The basic characteristics of the service (type, duration, content) are available on the Seller's website.
list: Online Video Courses (Python, Machine Learning, etc.)
Downloadable Source Codes and PDF Documents
Exam and Assessment Modules
Digital Certification Services

sections.heading: 4. GENERAL PROVISIONS
sections.body:
4.1. The BUYER declares that they have read and are informed about the basic characteristics of the product subject to the agreement, the sales price, the payment method, and the preliminary information regarding delivery on the website, and has given the necessary confirmation in the electronic environment.

4.2. Since the service subject to the agreement is digital content, it is made accessible to the BUYER immediately after payment approval. No physical delivery is made.

4.3. The SELLER is responsible for delivering the product/service subject to the agreement completely and in accordance with the qualifications specified in the order.

4.4. Payment transactions are carried out securely via Iyzico or Stripe infrastructure. Credit card information is not stored by the SELLER.

sections.heading: 5. RIGHT OF WITHDRAWAL AND EXCEPTIONS
sections.body:
In accordance with Article 15 of the Distance Contracts Regulation, services performed instantly in the electronic environment or intangible goods delivered instantly to the consumer are among the exceptions to the right of withdrawal.

However, within the scope of customer satisfaction, if less than 10% of the purchased course has been watched and 14 days have not passed since the purchase date, the BUYER's refund request may be evaluated by the SELLER. Details are specified on the "Cancellation and Refund Policy" page.

sections.heading: 6. COMPETENT COURT
sections.body: In the implementation of this agreement, Consumer Arbitration Committees and Consumer Courts in the place of residence of the BUYER or the SELLER are authorized up to the value declared by the Ministry of Trade of the Republic of Turkey.

sections.heading: DATA CONTROLLER
sections.body: As [Platform Name] Educational Technologies, in our capacity as the data controller in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 ("KVKK"), we may process, record, store, classify, update your personal data within the scope of the purposes explained below, and disclose/transfer them to 3rd parties limited to the purpose for which they are processed and/or in cases permitted by the legislation in accordance with the law and the rules of honesty.

sections.heading: 1. PURPOSE OF PROCESSING PERSONAL DATA
sections.body: Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:
list: Carrying out membership transactions and creating an account.
Providing and tracking access to educational content.
Managing certification processes (ID verification, QR code generation, etc.).
Carrying out payment transactions securely (via Iyzico/Stripe).
Analyzing video viewing statistics (with Vimeo/Bunny.net integration) to improve the platform.
Conducting communication activities and providing support services.
Fulfilling legal obligations (invoicing, etc.).

subSections.label: Identity Information:
subSections.text: Name, surname, ID number (if required for certification).

subSections.label: Transaction Security Information:
subSections.text: IP address, log records, device information.

subSections.label: Customer Transaction Information:
subSections.text: Course progress status, exam grades, billing information.

sections.heading: 3. TRANSFER OF PERSONAL DATA
sections.body: In line with the realization of the purposes stated above, your personal data may be transferred to our business partners (payment infrastructure providers, video hosting services), legally authorized public institutions, and private persons within the framework of the conditions specified in Articles 8 and 9 of the Law.

sections.heading: 4. RIGHTS OF THE PERSONAL DATA OWNER
sections.body: Pursuant to Article 11 of the KVKK, data owners have the following rights:
list: To learn whether their personal data is processed,
To request information if it has been processed,
To learn the purpose of processing and whether they are used in accordance with their purpose,
To know the 3rd parties to whom it is transferred domestically or abroad,
To request correction if it is processed incompletely or incorrectly,
To request its deletion or destruction within the framework of the conditions stipulated in Article 7 of the KVKK.

highlight.title: APPLICATION METHOD:
highlight.text: You can submit your requests regarding your rights under the KVKK to privacy@platform.com in accordance with the "Communiqu√© on the Procedures and Principles of Application to the Data Controller".

sections.heading: 1. REFUND POLICY SUMMARY
sections.body: We trust the quality of the training you purchase from our platform. However, if you are not satisfied for any reason, you can request a refund within the framework of certain conditions.

highlight.title: YOU HAVE A NO-QUESTIONS-ASKED REFUND RIGHT WITHIN 14 DAYS*

sections.heading: 2. REFUND CONDITIONS
sections.body: For your refund request to be approved, all of the following conditions must be met:
list: 14 days must not have passed since the purchase date.
More than 15% of the course content must not have been watched/completed.
The certificate belonging to the course content must not have been claimed/generated.
Downloadable source codes or special materials must not have been downloaded for abusive purposes (checked via system logs).

subSections.label: Creating a Request:
subSections.text: Request a refund from the "My Orders" section on your profile page or by sending an email to support@platform.com.

subSections.label: Evaluation:
subSections.text: Our support team checks whether the above conditions are met (viewing rate, certificate status, etc.) via the system. This process usually takes 24-48 hours.

subSections.label: Approval and Refund:
subSections.text: When your refund request is approved, the fee is refunded to the card/account you used for payment. It may take 3-7 business days for the amount to reflect in your account, depending on your bank.

subSections.label: Rejection Status:
subSections.text: In cases where the conditions are not met, the refund is rejected and the reason is notified to you via email.

sections.heading: 4. EXCEPTIONS
sections.body: Refunds cannot be made in the following cases:
list: Trainings received for free or at a discount within the scope of a promotional code, gift voucher, or campaign (only the paid amount is refunded).
Corporate purchases and B2B agreements (subject to agreement terms).
Purchases made from third-party markets (App Store, Google Play) (the refund policy of the relevant market applies).
After the live training/webinar recording has been made and the event has taken place.

sections.heading: 5. CONTACT
sections.body: For your questions regarding refund processes, you can reach us at support@platform.com.

sections.heading: 1. Information Collected
sections.body: We collect the following information from you when you use our platform:
list: Name, surname, and email address
Payment information (via secure payment providers)
Course progress and usage data
Device and browser information

sections.heading: 2. Use of Information
sections.body: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
list: To create and manage your account
To provide access to course contents
To process payments
To improve and personalize the platform
To notify you of important updates

sections.heading: 3. Information Security
sections.body: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data. All sensitive information is stored encrypted.

sections.heading: 4. Sharing with Third Parties
sections.body: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may only share it in the following cases:
list: Payment processors (Iyzico, Stripe)
Video hosting services (Vimeo, Bunny.net)
Legal obligations

sections.heading: 5. Cookies
sections.body: Our platform uses cookies to improve user experience. You can manage cookies from your browser settings.

sections.heading: 6. Your Rights
sections.body: You have the following rights under data protection laws:
list: To request access to your personal data
To request correction of data
To request deletion of data
To object to data processing

sections.heading: 7. Contact
sections.body:
For your questions about our privacy policy:
Email: privacy@platform.com

sections.heading: 1. INTRODUCTION AND ACCEPTANCE
sections.body: By using this platform ("Site", "Application"), you are deemed to have accepted the Terms of Use ("Terms") specified below. If you do not accept the Terms, please do not use the platform.

sections.heading: 2. ACCOUNT SECURITY AND MEMBERSHIP
list: To become a member of the platform, you must be over 18 years old or have legal guardian permission.
You undertake that the information you provide during membership (Name, Surname, Email) is accurate and up-to-date.
You are entirely responsible for the security of your account password. All transactions made through your account are your responsibility.
You cannot transfer or share your account with third parties. The system may temporarily suspend your account if it detects suspicious logins from different IPs/devices at the same time.

sections.heading: 3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS
sections.body: All content on the platform (videos, source codes, PDF documents, visuals, exam questions, etc.) belongs to [Platform Name] and is protected by international copyright laws.
list: Contents may only be used for individual educational purposes.
Copying, reproducing, reselling, publicly broadcasting, or commercially using the contents is strictly prohibited.
Sample codes shared in lessons (Applied Python, Django projects, etc.) are for educational purposes; direct use of these codes in commercial projects is the user's responsibility.

sections.heading: 4. PAYMENTS AND SUBSCRIPTIONS
sections.body: Some content may be paid. Payment for paid content is made via specified secure payment channels (Iyzico/Stripe).
list: Prices are the amounts specified at the time of purchase and include all taxes (unless otherwise stated).
The right to access purchased content is lifetime or for the specified duration.
The platform reserves the right to change prices without prior notice.

sections.heading: 5. USER CONDUCT
sections.body: While using the platform, you must avoid the following behaviors:
list: Sharing illegal, threatening, insulting, or immoral content (in Forum/Community areas).
Making attempts that will damage the technical infrastructure of the platform and disrupt its operation (DDoS, script injection, etc.).
Collecting or using the personal data of other users without permission.

sections.heading: 6. DISCLAIMER
sections.body: The platform shows utmost care regarding the accuracy and up-to-dateness of the educational content offered but does not provide a guarantee. The platform cannot be held responsible for direct or indirect damages (data loss, software errors, etc.) that may occur as a result of implementing the training. Software development inherently carries risks, and the user is responsible for the precautions they take in their own environment.

sections.heading: 7. MODIFICATIONS
sections.body: The platform reserves the right to update these Terms of Use at any time. Changes enter into force on the date they are published on the site.

sections.heading: 8. CONTACT
sections.body: For any questions and suggestions regarding the terms of use, you can contact us via legal@platform.com.
